text: Carson is a ghost town in Howell County, Missouri. It is in the Ozarks of southern Missouri. The community was located on Missouri Route ZZ, it was next to the railroad. Carson is about two miles southeast of West Plains, Missouri.West Plains, Missouri, 7.5 Minute Topographic Quadrangle, USGS 1983 A post office named Carson was built in 1908. It was used until 1928. The community has the name of Jack Carson, a businessperson in the local mining industry. ==References== Category:Settlements in Missouri Category:Ghost towns in the United States
title: Carson, Missouri
